channel.title: Ambush | Oldschool server | 474 | New osrs items/npc's
channel.description:
[center]Yo! Welcome to the official Ambush advertisement thread! Ambush is an oldschool server around the 2007ish era. We aim to have a server that revolves around the PvP aspect while still having other things for you to do outside of Pking such as minigames and PvM.
We plan on adding all sorts of other features from osrs such as the new bosses relatively soon. Another thing we want to start to implement is proper skilling. I am not even going to attempt to sugar coat it, the skilling isn't the best at the time of the release because i personally think the PvM and PvP aspects are much more important. [/COLOR]
[IMG]http://imgur.com/3ShrlDV.png[/img]In Ambush the whole world is safe besides Varrock. We made Varrock into a PvP zone to simulate PvP worlds on osrs. Keep in mind this does not mean you cannot Pk in the wild, that is still an option.
[IMG]http://imgur.com/kHdmRyR.png[/img][URL=http://"http://ambushrsps.com/"]Homepage[/URL] [IMG]http://imgur.com/T2OTvxm.png[/img][URL=http://"http://ambushrsps.com/forums"]Forums[/URL]
[SPOILER=Membership Perks]Here are a couple of our membership perks. If you have an other ideas please feel free to suggest them. - Vengeance count down timer. (the moment you use veng it starts counting down from 30) - Double pk points - Double vote points - Double slayer points - 10 extra prayer points when you pray, so say you have 52 pray, it gives 62. - able to use the yell feature. - you keep untradeable items in your inventory when you die. (fighter torso, firecape, etc) - custom title feature.[/SPOILER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bMElUwF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wkUw27H.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cYc3CAg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vwYLNJa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u5sdTVJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ykPzVWI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mfoMbki.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3cpZbyp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NAsWbWP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sIPyQjq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kxv8R9J.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZzsweJX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EmLorhu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ykmfjEP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5RlrbFM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EVxFzEa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/blgoWH1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gPxa349.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PkHvFw0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jHJP26Q.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: Ambush | Oldschool server | 474 | New osrs items/npc's
item.dc:creator: @Perplexity Perplexity
item.description:
@Perplexity wrote:

[center]Yo! Welcome to the official Ambush advertisement thread! Ambush is an oldschool server around the 2007ish era. We aim to have a server that revolves around the PvP aspect while still having other things for you to do outside of Pking such as minigames and PvM.

We plan on adding all sorts of other features from osrs such as the new bosses relatively soon. Another thing we want to start to implement is proper skilling. I am not even going to attempt to sugar coat it, the skilling isn’t the best at the time of the release because i personally think the PvM and PvP aspects are much more important. [/COLOR]

In Ambush the whole world is safe besides Varrock. We made Varrock into a PvP zone to simulate PvP worlds on osrs. Keep in mind this does not mean you cannot Pk in the wild, that is still an option.

[URL=http://“http://ambushrsps.com/”]Homepage[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://ambushrsps.com/forums”]Forums[/URL]

[SPOILER=Membership Perks]Here are a couple of our membership perks. If you have an other ideas please feel free to suggest them.

  • Vengeance count down timer. (the moment you use veng it starts counting down from 30)
  • Double pk points
  • Double vote points
  • Double slayer points
  • 10 extra prayer points when you pray, so say you have 52 pray, it gives 62.
  • able to use the yell feature.
  • you keep untradeable items in your inventory when you die. (fighter torso, firecape, etc)
  • custom title feature.[/SPOILER]




















[/center]
